purpose: The email announces the 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems (ICITS'26) to be held in Roatán Island, Honduras, from February 16-18, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit original papers on various topics related to Information Technology & Systems. The email outlines submission guidelines, important dates, and publication details for accepted papers.
evidence_sentences: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems
We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.
Submitted papers should be related with one or more of the main themes proposed for the Conference.
